== Pullu (627819) ==

Pullu is a village in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 383 hectares and harbouring 292 households with total population of 1196 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 15 km. Male population is 556 and female population is 640. Scheduled Caste Population is 335 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 627819<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
